content: our august makers kit is another great sue project we call it it took two this knit cowl is made holding two strands of yarn together throughout get it it took two we love the marled look that we get when we combine the shading yarn with a solid so fun we have kits for this project click here 1 each kit includes 1 skein kelbourne woolens scout 100% wool 274 yards/100 grams 1 ball louisa harding amitola 80% wool 20% silk 275 yards/50 grams hard copy of it took two you will need a us8 16 or 24 circular needle 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/it-took-two-august-makers-x83715729 htm
